trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> types to UI Automation.
<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> is used as a peer for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> when it contains the following tree:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> 에 대 한 피어로 사용 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> 다음 트리 포함 되어 있으면:

trans-unit.source: ![HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects")

Because only <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types have peers, and visuals are not <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types, a common parent does not exist in the UI automation tree for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 피어를 가질 및 시각적 개체에는 없는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 형식, 공통 부모에 대 한 UI 자동화 트리에 존재 하지 않는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: UI automation expects a single root peer from the application; therefore, the .NET Framework creates a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> in order to serve as a single root peer to parent peers for the two <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화에서는 응용 프로그램에서 단일 루트 피어 따라서.NET Framework을 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> 두 부모 피어에 단일 루트 피어로 구현 하기 위한 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the root peer is a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> class.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />의 컨트롤 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" /> enumeration value.

Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />의 경계 영역을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
The bounding rectangle.
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
A string that contains "Pane".
Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />의 텍스트 레이블을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
The string that contains the label.
You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Name 속성을 참조 하는 컨트롤에 설명 하는 데 사용할 텍스트 문자열을 생각할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 모든 컨트롤에 대 한 텍스트 표현이 있는지 확인은 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] 지역화 된 방식으로 컨트롤을 프로그래밍 방식으로 참조할 수 있도록 합니다.
